terms.question: Terms & Conditions

terms.answer:
As a reward, EnerBank will give three hundred dollars ($300.00) (the “Incentive”) to any Referrer who refers a Qualified Referral to EnerBank which subsequently activates within a Loan Program.

Referrer - A Referrer Must:
  • Be a legal resident of the United States of America
  • Submit a completed loan application following the activation of the Qualified Referral in an EnerBank Loan Program
  • Not be an employee or relative of an employee of EnerBank or any of its affiliates
Qualified Referral - Means that all of the following conditions are met:
  • The business is not currently participating in a Loan Program
  • The business meets the minimum qualifications and conditions set by EnerBank and is activated in a Loan Program
terms.question: Program Participation

terms.answer:
The Incentive will be issued to the eligible Referrer within thirty days following the Qualified Referrals activation in a Loan Program and the successful completion and submission of the Referrer’s loan application. The
Incentive will be issued to the eligible Referrer in the form of an Amazon gift card. Incentives are considered
taxable income and are subject to federal, state and local taxes. EnerBank will follow the IRS requirements
regarding tax reporting.
terms.question: Reward Issuance

terms.answer:
A Referrer must complete a Contractor Referral Form in order to qualify for the Incentive. The Form can
be obtained at enerbank.com. The Referrer must complete all required fields within the Form. A separate
form must be completed for each referral that is made. Referrers may not refer themselves. After the
Contractor Referral Form has been completed, it should be submitted directly to EnerBank on its website
at enerbank.com/referral.
